Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

If Winged Warrior is doing Battlemech 
can I do Zoids? (Dewboy)(ps, sorry Kyle, 
the choices didn't want to fit) 

  o yes 
  o no 
  o only Chaotic Century 
  o only the regular Zoids 
  o what's Zoids? 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/surveys?id=942965  

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
